OOC: I've read the rules and you can only fire 2
explosives per post.

Mutate took the 2 explosions falling to the ground. He
counldn't believe this (wait until my next char shows
up Hugars approved and you better start praying I
don't target you with him I just have to deside on a
few last minute details before he shows up). He still
doubted his "destiny was fulfilled, so he might still
have some "devine" protection, but this was just
humiliating.

--- Legendarynemasis@... wrote:
> Actually I didnt ignore them. RDahl said he fired on
> something else after I 
> told him that hellpeon wasnt there. Unless he meant
> the somethign else being 
> the Infecticon fighting presently(Rdahl can you
> clear that up for me?). And 
> as for the 8 shots fired at the charachter, I havent
> posted yet so you cant 
> even say I ignored them.  Besides only one was fired
> at the chrachter 
> directly. The others were shot around him.
> 
> IC:
> As the central shot approached the Infecticon, a
> thin barrier of chaochitan 
> energy appeared and took the shot, and then
> immediately dissapeared 
> afterward. The other seven shots all went past the
> Mysterious infecticon 
> harmlessly. It then quickly opened fire on mutates
> torso and fired with each 
> micro fusion blaster inside its chest twice, sending
> a total of twelve fusion 
> blasts at mutate. As this happened the being flew
> backwards at an incredible 
> speed and picked up Megatron, who was now in gun
> mode.
>
